Vanilla.label: Vanilla mod
Vanilla.description: Mod that does not require anything beyond the base game.

NEW.label: New, untested
NEW.description: Mod that has been recently added, and that has not been fully tested yet.

NPC.label: For NPCs
NPC.description: Mod that affects NPCs in some way.

Replacer.label: Replacer
Replacer.description: Mod that replaces existing items in the game.

INI.label: INI Settings
INI.description: Mod that requires specific settings in the `StarfieldCustom.ini` file.

Installer.label: Custom installer
Installer.description: Mod that uses a custom installer, e.g. Vortex wizard or third-party installer.

Core.label: Core mods
Core.description: Core functionality mods that other mods depend on.

Core2.label: Core mods - level 2
Core2.description: Core functionality mods that build on core mods.

BAT.label: Batch commands
BAT.description: Mod that adds or requires batch commands to be run.

ItemCodes.label: Item codes
ItemCodes.description: Mod that contains items that must be added to the inventory using add item commands.
